member.name: INTLIST
member.summary: Contains an array or list of int data items from a visual style.

member.name: INTLIST.iValueCount
member.summary: Number of values in the list.

member.name: INTLIST.iValues
member.summary: List of integers. The constant MAX_INTLIST_COUNT, by definition, is equal to 402 under Windows Vista, but only 10 under earlier versions of Windows.
